hero.title: Welcome to the Municipality Ksar Toulal
hero.subtitle: The Urban Community of Toulal is Located in the Western part of Meknes.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Official urban community of Meknes province
about.description: The municipality of Ksar Toulal is an official urban community in the Meknes Province of the Fez-Meknes region. It was established in 1992 by two official decrees. The municipality covers an area of ​​approximately 2,723 hectares and has a population of approximately 13,000 to 14,000, with a large proportion of active youth. The municipality has a fully integrated administrative apparatus, including administrative and technical staff, with seven new employees recently hired. The municipality is managed by a communal council of 15 councilors. The municipality is responsible for providing basic services to residents, such as cemetery management, infrastructure, sanitation, security, and the improvement of public facilities. Despite some challenges, such as the cemetery being full and the need for infrastructure development, the municipality of Ksar Toulal is a dynamic urban area that seeks to improve its services by modernizing its administration and strengthening communication with the local community.

first.name: Mustafa Hamdan
first.about: He assumed the presidency of the urban community after the September 8, 2021 elections as a Justice and Development Party candidate.

second.name: Mohammed Saif
second.about: He was elected as mayor after the 2015 elections to lead the municipal council as a member of the Independence Party.

third.name: Hafid Malhi
third.about: He took office after the 2015 elections.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of administrative services.

first.title: Rokhsa
first.description: Thousands of users inside and outside Morocco use the Rakhis platform to quickly and easily obtain the necessary licenses for their economic and urban activities, 100% digitally.

second.title: Wati9a
second.description: A document is a Moroccan electronic platform that enables citizens to request civil status documents such as an increase in the Internet without the need to transfer to the province, you can submit the request from your phone or your computer, and the document sends to your door via the guaranteed mail, whether you are an income for Morocco or outside.

third.title: The integrated system for managing expenses
third.description: GID platform (integrated system of expenses) is a Moroccan electronic portal affiliated with the Kingdom's public treasury used to manage and track public and administrative expenditures digital and transparently

fourth.title: GIR-CT
fourth.description: Gir-CT is a Moroccan electronic platform for managing the revenues of dirt groups, aiming to improve the collection of local taxes and fees and facilitate their tracking in a digital and integrated manner.

fifth.title: Indemaj
fifth.description: It is an official electronic service from the public treasury of the Kingdom
